item.title: Megan add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "Far away there in the sunshine are my highest aspirations. I may not reach them, but I can look up and see their beauty, believe in them, and try to follow where they lead." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Megan add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Megan add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved -- loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Megan add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Megan add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark." -- Victor Hugo

item.title: Megan add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "I am a believer in free will. If my dog chooses to hate the whole human race except myself, it must be free to do so." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Megan add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "If I give you a hint and tell you it's a hint, it will be information." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Megan add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "I assure you, my friends, I am cone sold stober." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Megan add a quote by Diana Wynne Jones
item.description: "You've no right to walk into people's castles and take their guitars." -- Diana Wynne Jones

item.title: Megan add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "The way to happiness: Keep your heart free from hate, your mind from worry. Live simply, expect little, give much. Scatter sunshine, forget self, think of others. Try this for a week and you will be surprised." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Megan add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Plant seeds of expectation in your mind; cultivate thoughts that anticipate achievement. Believe in yourself as being capable of overcoming all obstacles and weaknesses." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Megan add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Stand up to your obstacles and do something about them. You'll find they haven't half the strength you think they have." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Megan add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Megan add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "If you want a quality, act as if you already have it. If you want to be courageous, act as if you were - and as you act and persevere in acting, so you tend to become." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Megan add a quote by Norman Vincent Peale
item.description: "Do not be awe struck by other people and try to copy them. Nobody can be you as efficiently as you can." -- Norman Vincent Peale

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "There are some things that it is better to begin than to refuse, even though the end may be dark." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "For it is easier to shout 'Stop', than to do it" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Never laugh at live dragons." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "Little by little, one travels far" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Megan add a quote by Lisa Ann Sandell
item.description:
"Still, I look down, and the grass is so green, I cannot understand how it does not wither and die with sorrow.
~Song of the Sparrow" -- Lisa Ann Sandell
